```{r}
# read the file stat_data_for_checking_changes_directions
library(lsr)
library(effsize)
library(dplyr)

main_data = read.csv("stat_data_for_checking_changes_directions.csv", header = TRUE, sep = ",")


for (dataset in unique(main_data$dataset)){
  print(dataset)
  print("#################")
  dataset_data = main_data[main_data$dataset == dataset,]
  print(t.test(dataset_data$higher, dataset_data$lower, paired = TRUE))
  print(cohen.d(dataset_data$higher, dataset_data$lower, paired = TRUE))
  for (llm in unique(dataset_data$llm)){
    print("-----------------")
    print(dataset)
    print(llm)
    llm_data = dataset_data[dataset_data$llm == llm,]
    print(t.test(llm_data$higher, llm_data$lower, paired = TRUE))
    print(cohen.d(llm_data$higher, llm_data$lower, paired = TRUE))
    print("-----------------")
  }  
}

### ### ### ### ### ### ### ### ### ### Analysis for the Gender only  ### ### ### ### ### ### ### ### ### ###

gender_data = main_data[main_data$dataset == "gender",]
# filter out the llm that is llama
gender_llm_data = gender_data %>% filter(llm != "llama")
print(t.test(gender_llm_data$higher, gender_llm_data$lower, paired = TRUE))
print(cohen.d(gender_llm_data$higher, gender_llm_data$lower, paired = TRUE))

### ### ### ### ### ### ### ### ### ### Analysis per dimensions of the psych constructs  ### ### ### ### ### ### ### ### ### ###

for (dataset in c("essays", "wassa", "facebook")) {
  dataset_data = main_data[main_data$dataset == dataset,]
  for (label in unique(dataset_data$label)) {
    print("*****************")
    print(dataset)
    print(label)
    label_data = dataset_data[dataset_data$label == label,]
    print(t.test(label_data$higher, label_data$lower, paired = TRUE))
    print(cohen.d(label_data$higher, label_data$lower, paired = TRUE))
    print("*****************")
  }
}

```
